mapper.sql: a.id, a.shopName, a.shopNo, a.master, a.description, a.factory_id as "factory.id", c.factoryName as "factory.factoryName", a.remarks, a.del_flag, a.create_by as "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by as "updateBy.id", a.update_date
